About.Name: Owen Swartout
About.AboutText: Hi, I am Owen Swartout. Dedicated Electrical Engineering student and NCAA menâ€™s soccer athlete at Seattle Pacific University seeking internship opportunity. I'm excited to use my technical skills and teamwork experience to contribute to innovative projects. I'm ready to learn, collaborate, and gain hands-on experience in a dynamic team setting while expanding my industry knowledge.

Experience.ExperienceText: Through hard work and dedication, I was been able to graduate from high school with a 3.9 unweighted GPA, recieve a college soccer scholarship, and had summer internship experience at an engineering company.
Experience.EducationText: I graduated from Sherwood High School in Sherwood Oregon with a 3.9 unweighted GPA. I am currently a Sophmore at Seattle Pacific University with a 3.5 GPA. I plan to get my MBA later on in my carrer.
Experience.EmploymentText: I have experience as a test technician for an engineering lab (summer 2024 and summer 2025)
Experience.SkillsText: I have execptional communication skills, thrive in team enviornments, have great problem-solving skills, have a hard working personality
